graph.verb: Doctor's recommendation can be used to better understand the effect of treatment on recovery from illness.
Doctor's recommendation leads to treatment and treatment leads to recovery from illness.
Treatment leads to recovery from illness with an instrumental variable doctor's recommendation to deal with confounding.

Treatment is a direct cause of recovery from illness with a confounder patient's predisposition to illness and an instrumental variable doctor's recommendation. Treat all variables as binary and assume no other variables or causal relationships.
